remarks: Two subspaces in a proper subset relationship imply the existence of a 1-dim subspace less than or equal to one but not the other. ( ~ chpssati analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2014.)
statement:
lssat.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lssat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lssat $p |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. S /\ V e. S ) /\ U C. V ) -> E. p e. A ( p C_ V /\ -. p C_ U ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d S p $.
$d U p $.
$d V p $.
$d W p $.
